benchmark_details.name: SEMAN TICMEMES
benchmark_details.overview: We introduce the SEMANTICMEMES dataset of 3.8 million meme images clustered by their semantic function, constructed to analyze linguistic variation in memes across different communities on Reddit.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure linguistic variation in memes and analyze how social factors contribute to this variation.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on human judgment comparing semantic and visual similarity.
methodology.interpretation: High precision indicates coherent semantic clusters, while lower visually adjusted precision suggests clustering is biased towards visual similarity.
methodology.baseline_results: RoBERTa model has the highest visually-adjusted precision.
methodology.validation: Human evaluators were used to assess coherence and similarity of meme clusters.

harm: Potential presence of offensive or harmful memes within the dataset.
